about_the_game:
The Merchant of Death found some antiques! Keep the peace like a Cowboy or disrupt it as an Outlaw with four firearms and a hat. Embody the Western giant, Eastwood.

The New Weapons
  • 1872 Colt Single Action Army “Peacemaker” - A western Single Action Army revolver that fires .45 Colt.
  • 1883 Sawed off Double Barrel “Rebel” - A Sawed-Off 12 Gauge shotgun with a full buttstock.
  • 1883 Sawed off Double Barrel “El Dorado” - A Sawed-Off 12 Gauge shotgun with a pistol grip, with the ability to holster it in your pistol holster.
  • 1894 Marlin Lever-Action Rifle “Rowdy” - A 1894 Marlin Lever-Action Rifle that fires .44 Magnum; brought to modern standards with picatinny rails and bandoliers on the barrel and stock of the firearm.
  • The Gambler - A Cowboy Hat to embrace Eastwood’s image.

The items listed are NOT Weapon Skins. These are entirely new firearms that are purchasable from the Merchant of Death after accumulating the appropriate trader level with Sean at the Spectre firearm shop.

  • 1883 Sawed off Double Barrel “Rebel” - A Sawed-Off 12 Gauge shotgun with a full buttstock.

  • 1894 Marlin Lever-Action Rifle “Rowdy” - A 1894 Marlin Lever-Action Rifle that fires .44 Magnum; brought to modern standards with picatinny rails and bandoliers on the barrel and stock of the firearm.
  • The Gambler - A Cowboy Hat to embrace Eastwood’s image.

The items listed are NOT Weapon Skins. These are entirely new firearms that are purchasable from the Merchant of Death after accumulating the appropriate trader level with Sean at the Spectre firearm shop.
